text:
As reading doc/NT-Service-howto.html I tried to make tomcat
as a NT service. But "net start jakarta" failed.

I also couldn't let it work as a NT service if I unpacked
binary archive to the path which includes *whitespace*
(As you know, Windows OS allows it). But for this, I am
not sure whether it is really bug or my mistake.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text: This is a known and documented problem, I don't think we'll have a fix very soon - a workaround is available.
